wrapperStrategy.title: The Intelligent Wrapper Strategy
wrapperStrategy.subtitle: Overlay Architecture
wrapperStrategy.description: The core of the implementation approach is the refusal to replace legacy systems entirely. Instead, the platform connects to them to extract 'Dark Data'. An Intelligent Wrapper that overlays existing infrastructure to create a single thread from the sensor edge to the executive mobile device.

features.title: Non-Intrusive Connection
features.description: The system utilizes an 'Overlay Strategy' that connects to existing read-only data ports via standard APIs (REST, MQTT, OPC-UA). This ensures that operations are not disrupted and machines do not need to be stopped for installation.

features.title: Preservation of Investment
features.description: By treating the new platform as an 'Intelligence Wrapper,' companies preserve their existing IT investments while unlocking the 60–80% of machine data that is typically unanalyzed.

armes.description: ArMES manages the complexity of your production lifecycle, creating a 'Digital Thread' that correlates every raw material lot to a finished unit.

steps.title: Raw Material Management
steps.description: Live tracking of silo levels, humidity, and lot numbers.

steps.title: Digital Recipe Control
steps.description: Ensures 95%+ recipe accuracy across all shifts.

steps.title: ERP Integration
steps.description: Seamless two-way sync with SAP/IFS. Pulls orders, sends shop-floor truth back.

steps.title: Lab-Integrated Gating
steps.description: Hard pre-requisites. Production stops if quality results deviate from the recipe.

capabilities.title: Contextualization
capabilities.description: ArMES transforms raw signals into operational reality by adding the 'Who, What, When' of production.

capabilities.title: Orchestration
capabilities.description: Manages workflows, tracks OEE (Overall Equipment Effectiveness), and enforces quality checkpoints.

capabilities.title: Integration
capabilities.description: Syncs laboratory test results directly with the production flow.

modules.name: Authorisation and Authentication
modules.description: This module handles security and user access. It supports authentication via corporate directories, standalone ARMES directories, or social accounts, with Single Sign-On (SSO) and Two-Factor Authentication available upon request. Access control is granular, allowing permissions to be set by module, screen, or even specific tabs.

modules.name: ERP Integration Order Tracking
modules.description: Facilitates a two-way integration with the customer’s ERP system. It collects weekly or monthly orders, synchronizes material numbers and codes, and automatically updates the ERP with shop-floor status and raw material analysis reports.

modules.name: Raw Materials & Additives
modules.description: Integrates with SCADA systems to track material levels, humidity, and utilization. It matches raw material party numbers with produced material batch/lot IDs and triggers laboratory result entries based on time, amount, or new parties.

modules.name: Recipe Management
modules.description: Ensures quality criteria reporting and historic data traceability are checked against the specific recipe used on the exact date of production. Integrated with Order Management and Laboratory modules.

modules.name: Order Management
modules.description: Works in tandem with ERP integration to organize production. Reporting features track processed Order_IDs over time, including details on materials, recipes, and shipped facilities.

modules.name: Laboratory & Forms Management
modules.description: A digital document management system that acts as a control gate for production. Supports Maker/Checker workflows and ensures exact measurements are executed before moving to the next production step.

modules.name: Material Transfers & Interventions
modules.description: Manages production flow and corrections. Enforces business rules for transfers, triggers new lot_ids, and ensures traceability by updating lot IDs with intervention details.

modules.name: Shipment and Return Management
modules.description: Manages logistics of finished goods, fully integrated with the laboratory flow to ensure quality checks before shipment. Provides entity information based on material, recipe, and Lot ID.

modules.name: Reports and Monitoring
modules.description: Provides comprehensive analytics including Production Analysis (Lot ID tree), Process Performance, OEE & Capacity (Overall Equipment Effectiveness), and Material Change tracking.

modules.name: Inventory Management
modules.description: Tracks material levels, silo statuses, and live amounts across the factory. Integrated with Raw Materials and Digital Factory modules for real-time inventory visibility.

modules.name: Digital Factory (Live)
modules.description: Creates a visual 'digital twin' of the shop floor. Displays end-to-end factory layout with live indicators for each station, showing real-time data on materials, recipes, humidity, and lot IDs.

arai.title: ArAI: Advanced Reasoning & Semantics
arai.tagline: The Digital Consciousness of Your Factory
arai.description: Intelligence is more than text prediction. This architecture employs a modular reasoning layer to understand intent, causality, and relationships before formulating a plan.
arai.statement: **ArAI** moves the factory beyond simple "If/Then" logic. By combining **Causal Reasoning** with historical data, it allows the system to understand **WHY** things happen, not just **THAT** they happened.
